page.title: 20CIMLA COMMUNITY GROUPS
page.content: There are several clubs and organizations based in the Cimla area. Most are concerned with the welfare of residents, e.g. the Cimla Community Centre Association, or with leisure activities. Some of the groups currently available for children are :- Brownies, Cubs, Scouts, Guides and Chess and Cricket clubs.For adults there is :- Ladies Keep Fit, Slimming, Young Wives, Mothers and Toddlers Group, Hyperactive Club, Gardening Club, Cimla and District Welfare Association, Rugby Club and Cricket Club. There is a Community Centre in nearby Tonmawr but another is planned for the Cimla area. This will be built in the grounds of Crynallt Junior School and the facilities will include doctors' surgery and clinic, community hall and leisure areas.
